originalText.text: i used Vesey Handyman Same Day 2 times in the last 2 months. He is very competent in all phases of home repair. Excellent work skills and very professional, too! I’m really pleased with his work and would love to have him around again in the future!

originalText.text: I highly recommend  the services of Vesey Handyman Same Day. I had very good experience with them recently as they did a big project in my kitchen, to my full satisfaction. What I liked also apart from their professionalism is their decency, as they had advices that saved me a lot of money. I warmly recommend this honest and fine company.

originalText.text: Just called three times to hire this company and the person hung up the phone on me after answering, did not even let me say what I needed help with. Extremely rude and unhelpful as I was looking to hire their services for multiple locations.

originalText.text: The gutter in our house had been broken for a long time and I thought it's high time for me to have it repaired. I scheduled an appointment with Vesey Handyman Same Day and they sent me a skilled man. Wow! He's not just neat and good in his work but he's also very approachable. I tried asking him some questions about my concerns and he answered it very well! Thank you so much.

originalText.text: Last Monday, I called Vesey Handyman Same Day and they sent out a guy who worked on my fence. As expected, it was a job well done! Thank you, Vesey Handyman Same Day! Highly recommended.
